attributes.action: Force banks to process card transactions faster for small businesses
attributes.additional_details: Many customers are not using cash due to the current outbreak and preferring to use card payments. Many smaller businesses use card processing machines that can take 3-4 working days to clear, this is causing cash flow problems for smaller businesses during the outbreak. Please pass a ruling for payments to be released within 24hrs by all card machine providers.
attributes.background: Make it mandatory for banks to release card payments within 24hrs rather than 2-3 days during the outbreak to help assist small businesses with cash flow.

rejection.details: The processing of card payments is a matter for individual banks and the independent Financial Conduct Authority.
